gist.headline: Job hunting made easier
gist.blurb: FeedHire joins the ecosystem! A new AI-powered tool to filter the noise and find the signal in job postings across the web.
gist.summary: Added FeedHire, an AI job aggregator for Telegram and Reddit, to the community apps directory.
gist.impact: Users can now discover FeedHire in the apps list to streamline their job search process.
gist.visual_concept: Polly the Bee and the Robot companion reviewing a glowing digital bulletin board. The board represents the 'feed' of jobs. The scene should feel like a cozy, helpful employment center.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of Polly the Bee and the chunky robot looking at a glowing digital bulletin board filled with job listings. The board glows lime green (#ecf874). Soft pastel gradient background. Warm lighting, lo-fi office vibes. Pixel text on board: 'JOBS'. Nostalgic and helpful atmosphere. Cozy pixel art, 8-bit aesthetic, soft pastel gradients, warm lighting, retro gaming vibes.
